website_summaries.verdict: Many indoor cats benefit from this lower calorie formula because of lower activity levels.
pros: Contains 25 essential vitamins and minerals for indoor cats
Lower in calories than the other foods
High fiber content reduces hairball formation
Balanced nutrition profile for active indoor cats
cons: Rare concerns about strong fecal odors

customer_reviews.title: It's not as though we have a choice...
customer_reviews.text: We feed our cats four different types of dry food (free access) and wet food in pouches twice a day. One cat in particular is extremely fussy. She doesn't like any wet food at all (nope, not even tuna) and will only eat this particular dry food. No matter how hungry she is, if this food isn't in the bowl, she will ignore all the other food and insist we fill up the bowl. (She has her ways of "insisting." You know what I mean.) I realize it's not uber-gourmet health food like some other brands, but she won't eat other brands. She seems to be in great health despite her self-limiting diet, so we're okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mallette

customer_reviews.title: A good, solid, healthy cat food
customer_reviews.text: Well, I personally haven't tried it, but the cats seem to think it's pretty good. Not that they have a lot of choice. But they eat it, they ask for it, they are plump but not overly so, and the vet says it's a good, healthy cat food. As an added bonus, the cats don't barf it back up and we don't have hairball issues in this house... and believe me, with all the hair flying around here, that is bordering on miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Liikes It...Easts it Enthusiastically....
customer_reviews.text: I am always concerned when I change brands of food for my cat. Anyone who owns a cat will know what I mean about their loyalty to something and how they can react when changes are made. Happily, she took right to this, after a couple of tentative sniffs, walk abouts then settling in for a meal. She's happy, I'm happy, and it must be good for her, she's not young and her fur and activity level seem to be somewhat improved since the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Troop

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this variety!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my cats Purina products since 1978. I've cared for about 40 throughout the years, including fostering kittens for adoption through a shelter. Several of my cats have lived to 18 or 19 years of age on Purina products. I don't see the need for "fancy" new foods. Purina has been providing quality feeds for many years. This variety is particularly loved by my cats and I like that it is formulated for indoor cats, since none of mine go outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but then we leave food out all the time and cats tend to eat when they're bored.
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my outside cats and it seems to help keep their weight down. My husband and I err on the side of feeding our outside cats too often, so I think the Indoor formula helps maintain a healthier weight for them. As for our indoor cats, I can't tell if it's helping keep their weight down. We've fed this brand to them for years and 2 of them still ended up with diabetes, but then we leave food out all the time and cats tend to eat when they're bored.
customer_reviews.author: Stranded Candid

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this stuff, very happy with this food.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff, it may be the first time she ever had fresh cat food. I have it stored in a container, her previous cat mom had a huge bag of food for just her. They said she preferred their dogs' food, probably because her food had gone stale. It only lasts so long, if not stored properly. It was like a fifty pound bag, it had to have gone rancid at some point. She really enjoys this stuff, I like that the kibbles are smaller, and it has the ingredients for indoor cats. So, we are happy, and I will make this her preferred dry cat food, in future.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa in SLO

customer_reviews.title: The kittys like it...
customer_reviews.text: Priced competitively with the convenience of delivery. Cats gave it 4 stars and would have given 5 but the bag prevents them from getting as much as they want whenever... Did I mention cats, ya, I did... ! Worth noting is the size of the kibble is smaller so that a variety of feline ages can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D. Anglin

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRY CAT FOOD EVER
customer_reviews.text: My indoor cat is 15 years old and has eaten this for the past 14 years and she has never had a problem. The first year I fed her Purina Kitten Chow. These "new and improved" cat foods may have other ingredients but they sure cost tons more and since Brucie has NEVER EVER been any kind of sick, I have absolutely no reason to change. I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mandasia

customer_reviews.title: Cat is happy, so am I.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry food I give to my cat. He seems to like it just fine and he passes his yearly checkups with flying colors. He's in great shape and I see no reason to change what works.
customer_reviews.author: Nic N.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Cat Chow!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is as spoiled as can be, but I had to put her on a diet. So i choose Purina Indoor Cat Chow even though my cat is both indoor and out. She wrnt for it imeadeatly and now turns her nose up at Reg Purina Cat Chow. Lol Also shes lost the extra weight that was causing her pain (due to a serious injury) and is now running, jumping, hunting and playing. Plus has gone back out for her neighborhood patrols! Shes like a kitten again! ( shes 7). Thanks Purina!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Burden

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat very ill!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a terrible allergic reaction to this food. She broke out with h a skin rash, and had to have a corrtizone, and antibiotics. Vet said this food is terrible, cirnmeal, and animal biproducts, lead to a lot of problems in sensitive cats. Beware, it’s not good nutrition! There are other Purina foods that have quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in july and thought I would need it sooner. Turns out I just needed to open it up. To my surprise, the bag had already been open and taped shut. I didnt of course notice this when it arrived or I would have sent it back. Food inside is lite in color, not the bright colors I see from the residual of the previous bag (purchased at store). I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats are very picky eaters, so I was ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats are very picky eaters, so I was surprised when they ate this bag and brand so of cat food. I have 3 cats and they ate the entire bag in 3 weeks. It usually takes a lot longer for them to eat a big bag of cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Briley

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food
customer_reviews.text: Read up on this brand of cat food. It not the best an not the worst food for cats. It is hard to beat while on a budget. Like shipping, brings bag right to the house. Amazon can't keep this in stock is the only down side

customer_reviews.title: My cat prefers this to more expensive indoor food or ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat prefers this to more expensive indoor food or to the other brand in this price range. It really does help out with litter box odor and causes him less digestive upset which was a problem with a couple of other brands. Unfortunately it's gone up in price a lot online. This size bag can be purchased for $12-14 in store. Hoping to see the price come back down online.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats and they love this stuff. Prefer it over almost all other dry food. We adopted a new cat recently and she wouldn't eat AT ALL. We tried canned food, science diet and nothing. She LOVES this and it's reasonably priced.

product_meta.title: Cat Chow Indoor, 16 Pounds
product_meta.description:
PURINA CAT CHOW INDOOR FORMULA
Indoor cats can be less active than their outdoor counterparts, so we created an adult formula to give them complete nutrition, plus help with weight management. They'll get fewer calories plus extra fiber to help control hairballs.

FEATURES
 * Helps control hairballs
 * Helps promote a healthy weight
 * Accents of garden greens

INGREDIENTS
Corn meal, poultry by-product meal, corn gluten meal, soy flour, animal fat preserved with mixed-tocopherols (form of Vitamin E), powdered cellulose, animal liver flavor, soybean hulls, malt extract, calcium carbonate, phosphoric acid, salt, choline chloride, potassium chloride, taurine, zinc sulfate, Vitamin E supplement, ferrous sulfate, manganese sulfate, parsley flakes, niacin, added color (Red 40, Yellow 5, Blue 2), copper sulfate, Vitamin A supplement, calcium pantothenate, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin supplement, Vitamin B-12 supplement, pyridoxine hydrochloride, folic acid, Vitamin D-3 supplement, calcium iodate, biotin, menadione sodium bisulfite complex (source of Vitamin K activity), sodium selenite.

ABOUT CAT CHOW
Purina Cat Chow understands that your cat is more than just a pet—they're your go-to listener, someone you can always lean on, and one of your closest friends. And no one understands that like we do. Our premium formulas are carefully designed to provide essential nutrition and contribute to your cat's overall well-being.

ABOUT PURINA
The reason we're so invested in the quality of our food is because we love pets as much as you do. You’ll find pets in our homes, and even sitting by our feet as we work in our offices.

Our passion for pets goes beyond pushing pet nutrition forward, and into forging partnerships in the pet welfare world and raising awareness of what pets truly need. After all, we've seen firsthand how powerful the bond with a pet can be, and the many unique ways that pets can strengthen our families and bring our communities closer.

Our quest to drive pet nutrition forward and conduct industry-leading research on the wellbeing of pets pushes our company to do more year after year. We work hard for your pets every day, and we love doing it.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :22 x 12 x 11 inches; 16 Pounds
 * Date First Available :April 22, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Nestle Purina
 * ASIN :B00HHI14KS

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars625 ratings 

PURINA CAT CHOW INDOOR FORMULA
Indoor cats can be less active than their outdoor counterparts, so we created an adult formula to give them complete nutrition, plus help with weight management. They'll get fewer calories plus extra fiber to help control hairballs.

FEATURES
 * Helps control hairballs
 * Helps promote a healthy weight
 * Accents of garden greens

INGREDIENTS
Corn meal, poultry by-product meal, corn gluten meal, soy flour, animal fat preserved with mixed-tocopherols (form of Vitamin E), powdered cellulose, animal liver flavor, soybean hulls, malt extract, calcium carbonate, phosphoric acid, salt, choline chloride, potassium chloride, taurine, zinc sulfate, Vitamin E supplement, ferrous sulfate, manganese sulfate, parsley flakes, niacin, added color (Red 40, Yellow 5, Blue 2), copper sulfate, Vitamin A supplement, calcium pantothenate, thiamine mononitrate, riboflavin supplement, Vitamin B-12 supplement, pyridoxine hydrochloride, folic acid, Vitamin D-3 supplement, calcium iodate, biotin, menadione sodium bisulfite complex (source of Vitamin K activity), sodium selenite.
